interestingcomments.content:
Would you be interested in a Lightroom kind of app to backup your photos on the cloud using Google Photos unlimited storage? /!/ I was thinking on doing this project for myself but I think it could be useful for more people. It would be open source and completely free.

My idea is making an app where I can group my pictures by rolls of film and back them up using google photos. It would upload them there and would be available to see via the app with some tags/filters and easily shared via google photos albums.

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/i24pil)
